subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jason Peters, the Buffalo Bills’ Pro Bowl left tackle, has ended his holdout and reported to the team. Peters will not play Sunday against the Seahawks. He had off-season surgery to repair a sports hernia and is required to pass a team physical.
